import React from 'react' import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form' import emailjs from 'emailjs-com' type Inputs = { firstName: string lastName: string email: string message: string } const ContactForm: React.FunctionComponent = () => { const { register, handleSubmit, errors } = useForm() const onSubmit: (data: Inputs, e: any) => void = (data: Inputs, e: any) => { console.log('data', data) e.preventDefault() emailjs.sendForm('service_edicoffee', 'template_rf96muo', e.target, 'user_22xKKTcPPK13VvltlBeLw').then( (result) => { console.log(result.text) }, (error) => { console.log(error.text) } ) } return (
